game.name: Pixel Driver
game.description:
Playing in a pixilated environment is always a great fun! Today we brought to you a brand new racing game where you find everything in a pixilated form. Choose a free ride of opt for a time attack mode as per your choice! No need to bother about the other cars that are running on the road. Only focus on to reach your destination to complete your mission in each mode! The cool and responsive controls of the game make it easier for you to dodge other vehicles at death-defying speed. 
Take your seat behind the wheel of exclusive pixel cars and be prepared to drive around the pixel city while seeking for some important things to do! Your car journey would not be finished here as there are plenty of adventures here to complete. You have to compete with other players and beat their best times to win in time attack mode in this cool html5 car game. Feel free to customize your vehicle with the help of the cool colors and parts you purchase through the coins you collect through your fine efforts!
The best thing is that the entire city is yours so you have the full freedom to do whatever you want to do. This best car race game features free ride and time attack mode, day and night cycle, pixel objects and customized car parts and color. Good luck to get the best high score in our cool driving games! Browse through our extensive world of racing games online where you do not have to download games to play! It takes a few clicks and the best racing fun would be yours all the time!!
